title: WisdomTree Collaborates With Chainlink To Bring NAV Data Onchain for the CRDT Tokenized Private Credit Fund - PR Newswire
summary:
The adoption of onchain NAV price feeds, relating to WisdomTree's private credit fund, CRDT, marks a major milestone in the evolution of regulated tokenized funds.
Launched September 12, 2025, the WisdomTree Private Credit and Alternative Income Digital Fund provides exposure to a diversified portfolio of liquid private credit and alternative income instruments, tracking the Gapstow Private Credit and Alternative Income Index.
By bringing NAV data onchain via Chainlink, CRDT gains: Automated, onchain NAV delivery using decentralized oracle networks.
"WisdomTree is excited to implement the Chainlink data standard to bring NAV data onchain for our Private Credit and Alternative Income Fund," said Maredith Hannon, Head of Business Development, Digital Assets at WisdomTree.
About WisdomTree WisdomTree is a global financial innovator and a leading sponsor of exchange-traded funds (ETFs), with over $130 billion in assets under management.

title: T. ROWE PRICE OHA SELECT PRIVATE CREDIT FUND ANNOUNCES SEPTEMBER 30, 2025 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND DECLARED TOTAL DISTRIBUTIONS OF $0.69 PER SHARE IN Q3 2025 - PR Newswire
summary:
NEW YORK, Nov. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- T. Rowe Price OHA Select Private Credit Fund (the "Company" or "OCREDIT") today reported financial results and total distributions of $0.69 per share for the quarter ended September 30, 2025.
Private credit remains attractive, especially relative to its liquid market counterparts, delivering 100-200 basis points1 of premium," said Eric Muller, OCREDIT's Chief Executive Officer.
T. Rowe Price has $1.77 trillion in assets under management as of September 30, 2025, and serves millions of clients globally.
As of September 30, 2025, OCREDIT is available in 54 states and territories.
As of September 30, 2025, OCREDIT is not registered for offer or sale outside of the United States.

title: Asset Manager TCW ‘Very Nervous’ About Parts of Private Credit - Bloomberg
summary:
From global banks to alternative fund managers, more senior financiers are warning of cracks in private credit.
TCW Group Inc.’s Chief Executive Officer Katie Koch told a forum in Hong Kong on Wednesday that she’s “very nervous” about parts of private credit.
Tony Yoseloff , chief investment officer of Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP, said there’s been a “race to the bottom” in terms of covenants.
